alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 6:09AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Echeconnee Creek near Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron affecting Houston, Bibb, Crawford and Peach Counties. Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson and Washington Counties. Little River near Washington affecting Wilkes and Taliaferro Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, East Juliette, Dames Ferry, West Macon, Macon, Clinchfield, Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Big Sandy Creek at US 441 near Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Echeconnee Creek near Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Minor flooding expands into the woodland areas upstream and downstream from the gage on Houston Road. Larger portions of creek access roads will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 17.3 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EDT Friday was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 15 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
